description: This file defines a mock class `dsFPDMock` for unit testing, which inherits from `dsFPDImpl` and uses Google Mock to mock its methods. It is used in testing the `dsFPD` interface related to FPD (Front Panel Device) functionalities.

classes.name: dsFPDMock
classes.description: A mock class for the dsFPD interface, used for unit testing and simulating the behavior of the real dsFPD implementation.

methods.name: dsFPDMock::dsFPInit
methods.description: Mocked method for initializing the front panel device.

methods.name: dsFPDMock::dsSetFPBlink
methods.description: Mocked method to set blinking parameters for a front panel indicator.

methods.name: dsFPDMock::dsSetFPBrightness
methods.description: Mocked method to set brightness of a front panel indicator.

methods.name: dsFPDMock::dsGetFPBrightness
methods.description: Mocked method to get brightness of a front panel indicator.

methods.name: dsFPDMock::dsSetFPState
methods.description: Mocked method to set the state of a front panel indicator.

methods.name: dsFPDMock::dsGetFPState
methods.description: Mocked method to get the state of a front panel indicator.

methods.name: dsFPDMock::dsSetFPColor
methods.description: Mocked method to set the color of a front panel indicator.

methods.name: dsFPDMock::dsGetFPColor
methods.description: Mocked method to get the color of a front panel indicator.

methods.name: dsFPDMock::dsFPTerm
methods.description: Mocked method to terminate/close the front panel device.

methods.name: dsFPDMock::dsFPGetLEDState
methods.description: Mocked method to get the LED state.

methods.name: dsFPDMock::dsFPSetLEDState
methods.description: Mocked method to set the LED state.

methods.name: dsFPDMock::dsFPGetSupportedLEDStates
methods.description: Mocked method to retrieve supported LED states.

calls: MOCK_METHOD(dsError_t, dsSetFPBlink, (dsFPDIndicator_t eIndicator, unsigned int uBlinkDuration, unsigned int uBlinkIterations), (override))
